hengli/camodocal

C++ library for camera and multi-camera rig calibration

Related repos

  • C++ library for robotics and vision smoothing, mapping, and sensor fusion
  • Turns cameras into Linux webcams
  • NVR interface for RTSP cameras with motion detection and HomeKit support
  • Framework for video analysis and structuring in C++
  • Camera application for the COSMIC desktop environment
  • Monitors multiple 3D printer camera feeds in a browser
  • Web interface for browsing camera recordings on a timeline
  • Turns any webcam into an IP camera
  • Tracks 3D points across multiple camera views
